section.p: You crawl up the side of the tower. Below you, the city is spread out like a carpet, fiery pin-pricks of light a mirror to the stars.
You complete your dizzying ascent, and come to a window ledge, near the top of the tower. The shutters are open to the warm night air, and you steal like a shade into the daimyo’s bedchamber.
He lies asleep on a massive bed, a concubine at his side, snoring loudly. A casket lies open on a table nearby. Inside, is a necklace of fabulous jewels, within easy reach of your hand.
